title: Coordinating with neighborhood parents around children's activities
description: Coordinating with neighborhood parents around children's activities
content:
Scenario: Coordinating with neighborhood parents around children's activities
    Given Margaret cares for grandchildren in neighborhood context
    And she interacts with other children and parents
    When Margaret participates in neighborhood child activities
    Then the neighborhood_elohim should help coordinate with other parents
    And it should facilitate communication about children's play and safety
    And it should support collective neighborhood childcare
    And Margaret should be recognized as part of neighborhood care network
    And grandparents should be valued participants in children's community
    And neighborhood should benefit from grandparent engagement
